name: DvDrum, Ultimate Drum Simulator!
description: DvDrum 4 is Here! DvDrum is a Sandbox Drum Simulator for Real-time Drumming. Build your Drumkits and Let's Drumming in a Realistic Drummer Experience! Play Drum Has Never Been So Fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 64bit Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX® 11.0 Additional Notes: Display with 1280x768 of resolution or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 64bit Dual Core CPU Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 based graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX® 11.0 Additional Notes: A quality sound system with subwoofer or headset
